com.poesys.accounting.bs.transaction

Class RegularItemDelegate

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.poesys.bs.delegate.AbstractDaoDelegate<S>
      • com.poesys.bs.delegate.AbstractDataDelegate<BsRegularItem,IRegularItem,com.poesys.db.pk.CompositePrimaryKey>
        • com.poesys.accounting.bs.transaction.AbstractRegularItemDelegate
          • com.poesys.accounting.bs.transaction.RegularItemDelegate
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.poesys.bs.delegate.IDataDelegate<BsRegularItem,IRegularItem,com.poesys.db.pk.CompositePrimaryKey>

    public class RegularItemDelegate
extends AbstractRegularItemDelegate

    A business delegate that provides an application programming interface for RegularItem objects and their dependents. This class delegates to an abstract class, AbstractRegularItemDelegate. You can modify this class to override methods in that class or to add operations to the API.

    Author:
    Poesys/DB Cartridge

    • Method Detail

      • createItem

        public BsItem createItem(java.math.BigInteger transactionId,
                         java.lang.Integer orderNumber,
                         java.lang.Double amount,
                         java.lang.Boolean debit,
                         java.lang.Boolean checked,
                         java.lang.String accountName,
                         java.lang.String entityName,
                         java.util.List<BsRegularItem> items)
                  throws com.poesys.bs.delegate.DelegateException

        Create a new RegularItem as a BsItem (the superclass).

        The RegularItem class has no key of its own but inherits from a superclass that has a CompositeKey. When you create an instance of this class, the delegate creates a key of that type in the superclass.

        Parameters:
        transactionId - parent key (Transaction key)
        orderNumber - sub-key and ordering number within transaction
        amount - the monetary amount in dollars of the transaction item
        debit - whether the item is a debit (true) or credit (false); default value is the debit-default value of the account
        checked - whether the value and details of the transaction item have been verified and reconciled
        accountName - foreign key used by setter to query associated object
        entityName - foreign key used by setter to query associated object
        items - a list of BsRegularItem items; the method adds the created regular item to this list as a BsRegularItem, allowing the caller to access the original object.
        Returns:
        the new RegularItem object
        Throws:
        com.poesys.bs.delegate.DelegateException - when there is a problem generating the key or creating the object
